title: Naspers gets CCI's clearance to buy minority stake in Vastu Housing Finance Corp
description: The Competition Commission of India has approved Naspers Ventures' acquisition of a minority stake in Vastu Housing Finance Corporation Ltd. Naspers Ventures, a subsidiary of Prosus NV, will acquire less than 10% equity in VHFCL, which provides home loans and other financial services. The deal ensures fair competition in the marketplace.
